document.name: resturants
document.sql: select y1.uid, y1.resturant_id, y1.name, y1.rating, y1.cuisine, y1.phone, y1.address, y1.image, coalesce(yt1.t1_count,0) as t1_count, coalesce(yt2.t2_count,0) as t2_count, coalesce(yt3.t3_count,0) as t3_count, coalesce(yt4.t4_count,0) as t4_count, coalesce(yt5.t5_count,0) as t5_count, coalesce(yt6.t6_count,0) as t6_count, coalesce(yt7.t7_count,0) as t7_count FROM yelp_resturant y1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t1_count from yelp_review where t1 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt1 ON (yt1.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t2_count from yelp_review where t2 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt2 ON (yt2.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t3_count from yelp_review where t3 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt3 ON (yt3.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t4_count from yelp_review where t4 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt4 ON (yt4.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t5_count from yelp_review where t5 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt5 ON (yt5.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t6_count from yelp_review where t6 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt6 ON (yt6.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN (select resturant_id,count(user_id) as t7_count from yelp_review where t7 = 1 GROUP BY resturant_id) as yt7 ON (yt7.resturant_id=y1.resturant_id)
